sprint_goal: Establish the foundational user registration and email verification flow, enabling new users to create and activate accounts.
key_deliverables: User registration endpoint; Password hashing; Secure token generation; Email verification workflow.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate a user registering and receiving a verification email; Show the user status change in the database upon verification.
success_criteria: All acceptance criteria for US-ID-001 and US-ID-002 are met; All quality gates passed.
mitigation_strategies: Configure SES/DNS correctly; Implement DLQ for SQS queue.
integration_windows: Integration testing with mock email service on day 8-9.

sprint_goal: Implement the complete user session lifecycle by enabling secure login and logout, and containerize the service.
epic_coverage: Core User Authentication & Registration, Service Foundation & DevOps
key_deliverables: Secure login endpoint with JWT generation; Logout with Redis-based session invalidation; Production-ready Dockerfile.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate login with valid/invalid credentials; Show a user logging out and their old token being rejected; Show the service running in Docker.
success_criteria: All acceptance criteria for US-ID-003, US-ID-004, US-ID-005 met; All quality gates passed.
risk_factors: RISK-001 (Security flaw in JWT); RISK-002 (Redis blocklist failure); RISK-005 (Login API performance).
mitigation_strategies: Mandatory security code reviews; High-availability Redis; Fail-safe interceptor logic; Load testing.
integration_windows: E2E testing of session lifecycle on day 8-9.

sprint_goal: Automate the full CI/CD lifecycle for reliable quality checks and deployments of the identity-service to the Kubernetes cluster.
key_deliverables: Automated CI pipeline with quality gates (lint, test, coverage, security scans); Automated CD pipeline to AWS EKS.
demo_objectives: Create a PR and show the CI pipeline running and passing; Merge the PR and show the CD pipeline automatically deploying the change to the staging EKS cluster.
success_criteria: All acceptance criteria for US-ID-006 and US-ID-007 met; Successful, zero-touch deployment to staging.
risk_factors: RISK-004 (CI/CD pipeline instability); RISK-007 (Skill gaps in Kubernetes).
mitigation_strategies: Implement manual deployment runbook; Pair programming on complex pipeline tasks; Allocate time for learning.
external_dependencies: Provisioned AWS EKS cluster and ECR repository.
integration_windows: Full pipeline E2E testing on day 7-9.
